body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Albert Kelly and I represent Auto Secure Inc. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Julia. For security purposes, could you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My date of birth is December twenty-third, nineteen eighty-seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Next, can you provide me with the last four digits of your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. The last four digits of my phone number are six five one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. Thank you for confirming, Julia. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Julia. Feel free to reach out to us anytime. Have a great day!
